In the new Add-On I have the enoying bug, that the bigest fairing, the new 5m size one, is too big. It is larger than the bigest fuel tanks in diameter, and the fairing peaces are separated from an other.

I have no mods installed, deinstalled it fom my original C:-harddrive, deleted all remains of KSP and I have reinstalled it on my other D:-harddrive as well. The bug is still there and I want to know if other people have this as well and if so, how to fix it, or that the KSP-Team fixes this bug, please.

According to the KSPweekly that came out yesterday, the oversized-fairing bug is being addressed in the next patch. 

Edited April 7, 2018 by Just Jim
Thank you, Jim.
